data.actual_result: The Notification Settings is blank until you try to scroll up/down.
data.short_description: Notification Settings return blank if you pick a setting then mute channel.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to Notification Settings. - + Add a Channel or a Category - Pick a channel. Make sure it’s not an already muted channel. - Pick any of the 3 options. - Mute channel. - Tap back.
